name: Fixies
description:
Each young Fixie is passing his education here in the School of Fixie’s! Assembling, repairing, research and object search are main directions of schooling. Nolik and Simka will gladly show you and tell you about the wonderful world of Fixie’s and their technology.
However, the bad luck comes - the first school day, and Professor Chudakov suddenly disappeared and Grandpus worries. Together with Fixies conduct, your own investigation and help Grandpus find out what's happened with Professor Chudakov.
Fixies. Mystery of the Professor - an educational game for childrens. A mixture of the genres "Hidden objects" and "Runner" represent the opportunity to completely immerse yourself in the world of children's favorite characters of the popular cartoon "Fixies".
If you have a small child and you are looking for good children's developing games with familiar to each child characters - this wonderful game with the search for items will please every child! However, schooling in the School of Fixie’s can’t begin without Professor Chudakov, and he mysteriously disappeared.
Children’s game for "Fixies. Mystery of the Professor" will suit both boys and girls over 3 years old. In this children’s game, along with the favorite characters of the animated cartoon "Fixies", the child will have to collect evidence by searching for hidden items to find a professor and resume training sessions!
Your child will learn to recognize images, colors and forms, the game develops children's creative and intellectual abilities, develops the logic and attentiveness of your child.
Your child is waiting for the search for hidden unique objects in various locations of Professor Chudakov's laboratory: tools, nuts, bolts, test tubes, instruments, Fixie’s attributes and much more!
If you are looking for games in the genre of "Hidden objects" or games with investigation, games with mysteries, games for boys, games for girls or just free games, then the development game for children "Fixies. Mystery of the Professor" is exactly what you were looking for. Each level aimed at finding objects, and the transitions between levels are mini games in the form of a "Runner" with coin collecting. This children’s developing games game is free.

Gameplay features:
• A "Hidden Objects" game with elements of runner.
• A chance to find yourself in the world of your favorite characters just as one of them (The Fixies cartoon).
• The player will meet other characters of the cartoon: Simka, Nolik, Grandpus, Fire and Verda.
• Bright graphics, rich sound, and animation.
• At each level, the player will have to find 10 to 15 objects.
• A mini-game — collect coins and open new levels!

Fixies – this is a unique chance to immerse yourself into the world of children’s favorite cartoon characters.
